title: National Public Transport Access Nodes (NaPTAN) - Ferry Ports

queries.query: select * from naptan_ferry_ports order by ST_Distance(LatLong, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint($1, $2), 4326));
queries.description: Find ferry ports closest to a lat/lon point
queries.name: nearest

queries.query: select * from naptan_ferry_ports where LatLong && ST_MakeEnvelope($1, $2, $3, $4, 4326);
queries.description: Find ferry ports within a region
queries.name: extent

queries.query: select * from naptan_ferry_ports where ST_DISTANCE((select latlong from codepoint where postcode = normalise_postcode($1)), latlong) < $2;
queries.description: Find ferry ports near to a postcode
queries.name: postcode
